rect.style: fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: - they do not affect the order
damage of your creatures and spells
- sum in order each creature's strength
- dead creatures: all with sum <= monster
- move to the graveyard all dead creatures
- the remaining creatures are not affected at all
- if the monster is still alive, its strength is

rect.style: fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: - only move to land or tower tiles
a free tile on your territory

text.tspan: - place initial home lands around it and

rect.style: fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: - remove common spells with your mark
- move mana from used to active
- mark common spells with your color
- move active temporary spells to graveyard

rect.style: fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: - must border two tiles in your territory

rect.style: fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: - at the beginning of each turn,

rect.style: fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: - setup draws one slot for each player
- players can reserve or cast spells
- draw new cards to fill empty slots
- Pre: redraw cards with your marks
- Pos: add marks to empty cards

rect.style: fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: - players complete quests to gain VPs
- players can complete the same quests:
- game finishes when all quests are completed

rect.style: fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

text.tspan: - cast spells move to active spells
- pay the cost at the top right
